name: EdgarAllanPoeQuotes
0:
”Alexa, ask Edgar Allan Poe's quotes to give me an Edgar Allan Poe Quote”
”Alexa, ask Edgar Allan Poe's quotes for a quote by Edgar Allan Poe”
”Alexa, ask Edgar Allan Poe's quotes to tell me a quote by Edgar Allan Poe”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: edgar allan poe's quotes
des: This skill will give you a quote from the American writer, editor, and literary critic Edgar Allan Poe. Edgar Allan Poe was an American writer, editor, and literary critic. He is best known for his poetry and short stories, particularly his tales of mystery and the macabre
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
